title: Restore and align pink-heart favicon static assets

requirements.summary: Add the missing generated favicon image files under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames referenced by frontend/index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/` contains all of the following files: `favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`
In a production build, requesting each of the above paths returns HTTP 200 (not 404).

file_operations.description: Add the 16x16 favicon PNG at this exact path so the existing HTML link tag can load it at runtime.
Add the 32x32 favicon PNG at this exact path so the existing HTML link tag can load it at runtime.
Add the 180x180 Apple touch icon PNG at this exact path so the existing HTML link tag can load it at runtime.
Add the 192x192 Android/Chrome icon PNG at this exact path so the existing HTML link tag can load it at runtime.
Add the 512x512 Android/Chrome icon PNG at this exact path so the existing HTML link tag can load it at runtime.

requirements.summary: Generate a crisp, centered, transparent-background pink-heart favicon set at the standard sizes used by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Each required favicon file is a simple pink heart on a transparent background, centered within the canvas.
The 16x16 and 32x32 icons remain recognizable (not overly detailed) and are not clipped.
No additional background shape (e.g., white circle) is present in the exported assets.

file_operations.description: Ensure the final 16x16 export is a very simple pink heart on a transparent background, visually crisp and centered, with no white circle/background shape.
Ensure the final 32x32 export is a very simple pink heart on a transparent background, visually crisp and centered, with no white circle/background shape.
Ensure the final 180x180 export is a very simple pink heart on a transparent background, visually crisp and centered, with no white circle/background shape.
Ensure the final 192x192 export is a very simple pink heart on a transparent background, visually crisp and centered, with no white circle/background shape.
Ensure the final 512x512 export is a very simple pink heart on a transparent background, visually crisp and centered, with no white circle/background shape.

requirements.summary: Confirm frontend/index.html favicon link tags resolve to existing generated assets and update HTML only if needed to stay aligned.
acceptanceCriteria: The `href` values in `frontend/index.html` for favicon-related `<link>` tags each correspond to an existing file in `frontend/public`.
After deployment and a hard refresh, the browser tab shows the new pink-heart favicon (allowing for normal browser favicon caching behavior).

file_operations.description: Verify the favicon-related <link> tags reference exactly these static asset paths under frontend/public: frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png. Update the href values only if they do not match the actual generated filenames.
